alert.note: Alert for Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; Central and South Weld County; Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet; Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 17 at 2:05PM MDT until October 18 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures of 28 to 32 degrees expected. * WHERE...Fort Collins, Castle Rock, Greeley, and Byers. * WHEN...From Midnight tonight to 9 AM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation, and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Move them indoors or cover with blankets and newspapers. Drain above ground sprinkler systems to prevent broken water lines.
